      • closeQuery

        protected abstract boolean closeQuery(Content content,
                                      boolean projectClosing)
        Checks if the specified Content instance can be closed/removed.
        Parameters:
        content - Content instance the closing operation was requested for
        projectClosing - true if the content's project is being closed
        Returns:
        true if the content can be closed, otherwise false
